document_data.name: Street of the Tusks
document_data.mainbody: '''Street of the Tusks''' was a street of hard-packed earth and [[gravel]]In the 1{{st}}-edition sourcebook ''[[Waterdeep and the North]]'', this location's name was misprinted as '''Street of the Turks'''.
document_data.Geography: This road began at [[Burnt Wagon Way]] and ran south to the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]], crossing [[Spendthrift Alley]] and [[Vellarr's Lane]] along the way.

Notable Locations.Links to Sewers: An entrance to the [[Waterdeep/Sewers|sewers of Waterdeep]] was located at the mouth of a dead-end alley opening that was just east off this street.
